thread.title: Questioning Mets' World Series rotation

title: Questioning Mets' World Series rotation
text: Questioning Mets' World Series rotation Sunday, 25 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) Matt Harvey's starting Game 1 of the World Series for the Mets, and Jacob deGrom Game 2. But is there a better way? C.J. Nitkowski thinks so. Mets Go To World Series... 00:45 CHICAGO The New York Mets completed a four-game sweep of the Chicago Cubs in the National League Championship Series with an 8-3 rout on Wednesday that put them into the World Series for the first time since 2000. Daniel Murphy added to his spectacular postseason by belting a home run for a Major... Recent related news One features a dominant rotation, the other a shutdown bullpen. NY Daily News 2 hours ago - Sports Matt Harvey will pitch Game 1 of the World Series for New York. FOX Sports 3 hours ago - Sports Matt Harvey has been picked to pitch for the New York Mets in the World Series opener at Kansas City on Tuesday night. MyNorthwest.com 4 hours ago - Sports The Mets rotation for their first World Series in 15 years is set. Newsday 5 hours ago - Sports
